meanings.definition: Relating to osmometry or the measurement of osmotic pressure.
meanings.sent1: The osmometric experiment provided valuable data on osmotic pressure.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use osmometric techniques to study osmotic pressure in cells.
meanings.sent3: The osmometric analysis of the solution revealed some surprising results.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in osmometric measurements was as sharp as a surgeon's scalpel.
meanings.sent5: The students conducted an osmometric investigation in the laboratory to understand osmotic pressure better.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the process of osmometry.
meanings.sent1: The osmometric calculations were crucial for the osmometry experiment.
meanings.sent2: Osmometric tools are essential for accurate osmometry procedures.
meanings.sent3: The osmometric analysis of the sample was like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The osmometric process unfolded like a carefully choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The students learned about osmometry through hands-on osmometric activities in class.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the measurement of osmotic pressure.
meanings.sent1: The osmometric device accurately measured the osmotic pressure of the solution.
meanings.sent2: Osmometric studies help us understand the factors affecting osmotic pressure.
meanings.sent3: The osmometric reading on the gauge made everyone cheer in excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her skill in osmometric measurements was like a musician hitting the perfect note.
meanings.sent5: The osmometric analysis shed light on the osmotic pressure variations in different solutions.
